pages.text: 92|15|Tate prabesa karabe se-i, ye nitanta hatabhagya
92|16|ye mithyaropa kare o mukha phiriye neya [1].
92|17|Ara ta theke dure rakha habe parama muttakike
92|18|ye sbiya sampada dana kare atasud'dhira jan'ya [1]
92|19|ebam tara prati kara'o emana kono anugraha ne'i yara pratidana dite habe [1]
92|20|sudhu tara mahana rabera sastustira pratyasaya
92|21|ara acire'i se sastusta habe [1].
93|1|Sapatha purbahnera
93|2|sapatha ratera yakhana ta haya nijhuma [1] â€“
93|3|apanara raba apanake parityaga karena ni [1] ebam sakrata'o karena ni.
93|4|Ara abasya'i apanara jan'ya parabarti samaya purbabati samayera ceye sreya [1].
93|5|Ara acire'i apanara raba apanake anugraha dana karabena, phale apani santusta habena [1].
93|6|Tini ki apanake iyatima abasthaya pana ni? Atahpara tini asraya diyechena [1]
93|7|ara tini apanake pelena patha samparke anabahita, atahpara tini pathera nirdesa dilena [1].
93|8|Ara tini apanake pelena nihsba abasthaya, atahpara abhaba mukta karalena [1].
93|9|Kaje'i apani iyatimera prati kathora habena na [1].
93|10|Ara prarthike bhartsana karabena na [1].
93|11|Ara apani apanara rabera anugrahera katha janiye dina [1].
94|1|Amara ki apanara baksa apanara kalyane prasasta kare de'ini [1]
94|2|Ara amara apasarana karechi apanara bhara
94|3|ya apanara pitha bhenge dicchila [1].
94|4|Ara amara apanara (maryada brd'dhira) jan'ya apanara smaranake samunnata karechi [1].
94|5|Sutaram kastera sathe'i to sbasti ache
94|6|niscaya kastera sathe'i sbasti ache [1].
94|7|Ata'eba apani yakhana'i abasara pana takhana'i kathora ibadate rata hona
94|8|ara apanara rabera prati gabhira manoyogi hona [1].
